tool.name: Circos: Stack bigWigs as Histogram
tool.description: reformats for use in Circos stacked histogram plots

param.name: input
param.label: BigWig files
param.help: These MUST have identical chromosomes and intervals, within their datasets. This tool is incredibly, intentionally naÃ¯ve, and will crash if there are missing ranges in some bigwig files. This feels like a reasonable assumption to make (simplifies processing) at the expense of theoretical correctness, given that when you are stacking histograms they're probably coming from the same upstream pipeline with the same settings (i.e. step/width/etc.)

tool.help:
Converts standard bigWig files into a format appropriate for Circos stacked histogram plots
If you need to process bedgraph, please convert those to bigwig first.
